page.title: 14Gala Queen Attendant
page.content: It was Gala Day at last. I had been chosen to be one of the Gala Queen's attendants. Sarah Glossop was my partner on the float. Our long dresses were white with blue flowers on them. I kept tripping up over my dress but managed to get on the float. It was a freezing day and we shivered. Soon it was time for the procession to go. Going down Station Road was very bumpy and I nearly fell off my stool. People waved at us. We waved back. Everyone clapped when we arrived at the back field, and the band played. The page boys bowed to the Queen and we held up her train as she got off the float. Then came all sorts of races and fun.At night there was a disco-dance. I couldn't dance very well in my long dress though.
